metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25869 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: All versions of package angular are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) due to insecure page caching in the Internet Explorer browser, which allows interpolation of <textarea> elements.

criterions.comment: angular.js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
